# Observation Parameters
# ----------------------
# f0: Starting frequency in MHz
# f1: Ending frequency in MHz
# f_res: Frequency resolution in MHz
# t0: Starting time in milliseconds
# t1: Ending time in milliseconds
# t_res: Time resolution in milliseconds
# scattering_index: Scattering index
# reference_freq: reference_freq frequency in MHz

f0=1100
f1=1450
f_res=2
t0=-2
t1=0.8
t_res=0.001

scattering_index=-4
reference_freq=1000
